text: Good idea, can you put them in the ideas forum, please, so the idea is not lost?
In case you did not notice, columns do now have descriptions, but a table description is a good idea as well.
<@U6W3H6YN8> Yeah, column descriptions are definitely helpful, but yeah, table descriptions would be very helpful as well for a different use-case. I’ll list these in the ideas forum, thanks.

A tiny QOL addition I’d love to see at some point: it’d be great to be able to preview the post-submission state of a form without actually signing up. It’s a hassle to remove myself from all of the lists and workflows every time I need to check or change some styling.
